summary: Shakespeare's epic play is translated from page to screen, with the gender of the main character, Prospero, changed from male to female.
cast: Felicity Jones|Jude Akuwudike|Reeve Carney|David Strathairn|Tom Conti|Alan Cumming|Chris Cooper|Helen Mirren|Ben Whishaw|Djimon Hounsou|Russell Brand|Alfred Molina|David Scott Klein|Bryan Webster
title: The Tempest
